reviewText: The movie is dated, but it is basically a movie about a gentleman who has to prepare a speech.  The acting was par, but the information invaluable.

This is a very good brief guide to public speaking.  (Which you'd expect since it's from Toastmasters.)  It's from the 80's, so the clothing is hilariously dated and I believe I noticed some smoking in some scenes.  And the music is super-cheesy.  If you can look past that (which I didn't have any trouble doing - I'm just making note of it for information), it's great.
